text: leyin nahawu athithayata wada yuda jayaga්rahanayakin pasuwa jathin athara, sanhindiyawa ki්rayathmaka kirima lokaya piligath usas dharmathawayaki.

mema nayakathwayange drohithwayata pinsidu wannata, kisidu wiruddhathwayakin thorawa ma pahe rajya anshaye lakshayak dena dotta damimata da emagin kamkaru panthiyata winashakari parajayak athkara dimata da ejapa aanduwata hakiyawa labuni. 21-6	sha්ri lankawe kamkaru panthiye awasana maha warjanaya wu 1980 wada warjanaye parajaya, purna parimanaye siwil yuddhayata dora hara duni.
